mapper.select: select id, titile, user_id, section_id, reply_num, view_num, approve_num, collect_num, content, post_time, update_time, image, video, type, can_read_users from bbs.t_post where id = #{id}

select id, titile, user_id, section_id, reply_num, view_num, approve_num, collect_num, content, post_time, update_time, image, video, type, can_read_users from t_post where title like concat('%',#{title},'%')
mapper.insert: insert into bbs.t_post(titile, user_id, section_id, reply_num, view_num, approve_num, collect_num, content, post_time, update_time, image, video, type, can_read_users) values (#{titile}, #{userId}, #{sectionId}, #{replyNum}, #{viewNum}, #{approveNum}, #{collectNum}, #{content}, #{postTime}, #{updateTime}, #{image}, #{video}, #{type}, #{canReadUsers})
mapper.update:
update bbs.t_post
titile = #{titile},
